sentences.en: Because of the perturbation, Mars experiences some torque.
sentences.cn: 因为有微扰, 火星就受到一些转矩的作用.

sentences.en: Convergence rate of moments for stochastic perturbation gradient approximation.
sentences.cn: 随机扰动梯度近似中的矩收敛率.

sentences.en: First - dimensional alternate type differential equations with impulsive perturbation is discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论一 维 空间中超前型与滞后型交替的脉冲微分系统.

sentences.en: Firstly, a perturbation and spaced eigenvalue problems of vibrating string is presented.
sentences.cn: 首先讨论了弦振动的孤立、相近特征值摄动问题.

sentences.en: He was making no attempt now to conceal his perturbation.
sentences.cn: 他已经不再企图掩饰自己的惶恐不安了.

sentences.en: Physics Astronomy To cause perturbation, as of a celestial orbit.
sentences.cn: 引起摄动, 如天空中轨.

sentences.en: Synchronization of chaotic system in the presence of random perturbation.
sentences.cn: 随机扰动下一类混沌系统的同步.

sentences.en: The ability of the soil to recover from perturbation.
sentences.cn: 土壤自干扰环境中之恢复能力.

sentences.en: The equations defining the zero - order perturbation simply govern the static solution.
sentences.cn: 定义零 级微 扰的方程简单地决定了静态解.

sentences.en: The robust stability of time _ lag systems with structural perturbation is investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究结构摄动的滞后系统的鲁棒稳定性.

sentences.en: The term & quot ; distress & quot ; connotes some degree of perturbation and emotional upset.
sentences.cn: 词语“痛苦 ” 意味着某种程度的不安和情感上的沮丧.

sentences.en: This message caused perturbation in the Middle East Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这则消息在中东总部引起了不安。

sentences.en: Time - dependent Perturbation Theory. Transition probability. Adiabatic theorem revisited. Sinusoidal perturbations.
sentences.cn: 含时微扰论. 跃迁几率, 重温绝热理论,正旋扰动.

sentences.en: Unwillingly she met his eyes, defiance and perturbation on her face.
sentences.cn: 她极不情愿地看着他的眼睛, 满脸反抗和烦乱的神色.

sentences.en: We must seek two main approximation methods of solution, the variation method and perturbation theory.
sentences.cn: 我们必须寻求两个主要的近似解法 、 变分法和微扰法.

words.tran_cn: 扰乱；使…混乱；使…心绪不宁
